name: Discord Experiment Hub
description: Hey, you there, welcome to Discord Experiment Hub, a place where you can discuss the technical side of Discord. Learn about the latest datamines, keep up to date with the latest news, and discuss experiments, betas and more!

name: PurLabs
description: Harness AIs from companies like OpenAI effortlessly, with services like embeddings, chat completions, image generation, audio transcription and so, so much more!

name: Toolbox.js
description: A collection of useful functions for JavaScript & Typescript.

name: Logchu
description: A very simple and cool logger for your Node.js projects. Supports JavaScript and TypeScript.

name: Fetchu.js
description: A simple and modern fetch wrapper for Node.js

name: Discord.js Bot Template
description: This is a template for a Discord bot. It is written in JavaScript and uses the discord.js library. It is designed to be easy to use and easy to modify.
